:{{A|vo kujousara saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Kujou Sara:''' But I do cherish the times when there is a brief lull in the fighting. I use this time to hone my skills through training.
:{{A|vo kujousara saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Kujou Sara:''' Right now, I intend to engage in a kind of training known as "rest and recovery," which consists of five sets of deep breaths.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Kuki Shinobu==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' You can leave the trickier opponents to me.
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' You did invite me here, after all, so I'll do my part for the cause, no problem.
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' As for what part that'll be exactly, arrange that however you wish. I can handle it.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' I do hope I'll get to read a story about a rebellious princess. You know, the type who sheds her long, cumbersome skirts, and learns equestrianism, swordplay... perhaps even medicine.
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' She'll live freely, take to the field to defeat evil personally, and defend the people and nation by her own hand...
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' ...Hmm. You know what? I might just write that story myself.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' Don't be too weirded out if you see me with my mask off while we rest. I'm just getting some fresh air.
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' This place is way too idle, it gets to you after a while... Got to take some deep breaths.
:{{A|vo shinobu saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Kuki Shinobu:''' Not that I'm rushing you, of course. I'll wait until you've made your preparations in full.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Lan Yan==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' The monsters here are a real tricky bunch... Why don't we switch up our strategy a little? That could catch them off guard.
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' I'll leave the details up to you, though, since you're the one with the combat expertise.
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' Whatever approach you decide, I'll follow it to the letter. I promise to be as nimble and agile as a swallow, so I'll never be a burden.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' I couldn't find any tales of the supernatural here. But I think I may have found something even more interesting...
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' See these? Both the art style and the prose would make you think they're written for children, and yet...
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' I just get this uncanny feeling after reading them, it's hard to describe, but... Ugh, I think I need to start by reading them a few more times.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' Did you know? The eight-hour stretch just before sunrise is the second-best time in the day to sleep.
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' ...Now you're probably wondering when the best time of all is.
:{{A|vo lanyan saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Lan Yan:''' Whenever you feel tired, of course! No matter what time of day it is, if you're feeling tired you should give yourself a break and take a nap. That's what I do.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Layla==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo layla saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Layla:''' I gathered the available data, did some analysis, and came up with some more effective battle strategies... Oh, I should write them down for her...
:{{A|vo layla saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Layla:''' I wonder if she'll be surprised when she wakes up?
:{{A|vo layla saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Layla:''' Well, sleepwalking time's almost up. Keep an eye on her in battle, won't you?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo layla saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Layla:''' Maybe it would be nice to read something a little lighter for once. It would be a nice break from the academic texts I usually read &mdash; they give me such a headache.
:{{A|vo layla saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Layla:''' Hmm... Actually, maybe not. I can't afford to relax yet, or I'll end up missing my next thesis deadline...
:{{A|vo layla saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Layla:''' I can't just rely on "The Stars' Blessing" to see me through. I have to put in the work myself!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo layla saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Layla:''' It's rest time now, right? Why can't I get to sleep...
:{{A|vo layla saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Layla:''' Wait, no! That was it &mdash; we have something important to do in a minute, right...? Yeah, I can't sleep now!
:{{A|vo layla saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Layla:''' Ugh, but if I'm not well-rested when we head off, I'm gonna mess things up for sure. I really don't know what to do...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Lisa==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' Hey, cutie. Heading back in? You know, the further in we go, the tougher the monsters are going to get...
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' But you've got nothing to worry about. I know every monster's weak spot like the back of my hand &mdash; I've read everything there is to know on the topic.
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' So if you need someone to teach them a lesson, just let me know.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' When knowledge is condensed into written form, it is always limited by the writer's perspective and interests.
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' So if we want to learn the truth of this mysterious domain, we'll just have to explore it for ourselves.
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' But then again, I'm lucky that I get to do the exploring together with my cutie.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' Ah, it's a rare treat to have a little time to laze around, and not have to think about all the fighting and killing.
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' Still, even lazing around isn't much fun on your own.
:{{A|vo lisa saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Lisa:''' Do you wanna keep me company for a bit, cutie? I can read you a story if you'd like.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Lynette==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' Looks like delving into this domain is gonna be challenging.
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' As a magician's assistant, what I'm good at is executing a specific plan. And trying not to make any mistakes in the process.
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' So, do you have a plan in place for showtime, {{Traveler}}?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' It seems like stories are highly valued here, right?
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' From what I remember, most stories are just a bunch of lies made up by adults.
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' I still made sure to listen along all beady-eyed when someone was telling a story, though. Apparently, kids who are too smart get on people's nerves.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' A short break with a cup of tea is the best way to wash away all your fatigue.
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' My teacup is hidden just behind this card.
:{{A|vo lynette saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' You're staring... Are you trying to say you want some tea, too?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Lyney==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' The battles ahead are not gonna be easy. Look me in the eyes, and answer me this: Are you worried?
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' Well... If magic is all about achieving the impossible, right before people's very eyes... Don't you think the best magician in the land might stand a chance of pulling that off even outside of a magic show?
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' What do you say? Are you ready to team up with the Great Magician Lyney, and see if we can't perform some miracles out there?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' I'm sure Freminet would love this book collection. He's someone who really sees the truth in fairytales, and believes in the world of childhood wonder they're set in.
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' I do understand the way he thinks, but...
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' ...The fairytale of childhood is nothing but a distant memory to me now.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' Two questions: Have you got a moment? And if so, would you like to see a magic trick?
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' Consider it... a rehearsal. Or simply a little light entertainment to lift the mood.
:{{A|vo lyney saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Lyney:''' Which deck of cards shall I go with.... Ah yes, this one suits the occasion!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Mavuika==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' What a wondrous place this is... You never know what the next challenge is gonna throw at you, hehe...
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Hmm? I sound excited? Well, yeah. I mean, seeking out challenges is pretty much my main hobby.
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' This place is like paradise to me. I'm really enjoying my time here.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' It seems like everything that happens here gets recorded in the form of a play.
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' But who is behind all of this? Someone passionate about records and legacy, I guess?
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Anyway, I like the fact that the records are available to view any time. It'll be interesting to look back on them in the future, and see what hindsight brings to the equation.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' How are you feeling? Getting used to the style of combat here?
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I gotta say, I'm growing to like this place. There are fun surprises everywhere, and it just feels free of any stress or tension.
:{{A|vo mavuika saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Let's take a short break, then dive in to the next challenge.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Mika==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mika saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Mika:''' Exploring this domain is no easy task, but please don't worry &mdash; I won't let everyone down!
:{{A|vo mika saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Mika:''' The Grand Master once told me that so long as I play to my strengths and contribute to the team, I'm doing my duty.
:{{A|vo mika saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Mika:''' I'll do my best. And I'm sure everyone else will do their part, too!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mika saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Mika:''' Mondstadt has changed so much in the short time I've been gone...
:{{A|vo mika saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Mika:''' Oh &mdash; I don't mean that I don't like the way things are now. I guess I just get a little nostalgic for the days I spent with the Grand Master's expedition sometimes.
:{{A|vo mika saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Mika:''' I wonder where they're all up to now? And whether they need any new maps...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mika saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Mika:''' A preliminary survey must be performed before delving into a domain. But here... hmm...
:{{A|vo mika saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Mika:''' If you don't mind resting here for while more, I might be able to go and gather some useful intelligence, {{Traveler}}.
:{{A|vo mika saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Mika:''' I'm nowhere near as good in combat as the others... But I wanna make sure I do my part!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Mona==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mona saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Mona:''' Oh, don't give me that look. I can't give you any astrology-based advice in here.
:{{A|vo mona saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Mona:''' What do you mean, why not? Look around you. Do you see any starlight in here? My scryglass has been completely undecipherable since the moment we arrived.
:{{A|vo mona saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Mona:''' But I can still be of assistance in other ways, of course. My profound powers of prediction extend beyond astrology.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mona saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Mona:''' Oh, you've got to be kidding me...! I just found a fairytale in one of these books that the old hag told me once...
:{{A|vo mona saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Mona:''' She said that she was the one who wrote it, and no one else in the whole world knew the story...
:{{A|vo mona saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Mona:''' So... that was just another one of her tall tales, hmm? Ugh, and you know what else she did? She handed it to me, saying she wanted to give her disciple a gift that was the only one of its kind in the whole world... I cannot believe that woman!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mona saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Mona:''' I for one definitely need some rest... I'm aching all over.
:{{A|vo mona saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Mona:''' You should sit yourself down and take a rest too, you know. The chance won't come by very often.
:{{A|vo mona saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Mona:''' And who knows how long it'll be before we reach the end of this domain. We simply have to conserve our strength &mdash; that much is indisputable.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Mualani==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' The challenges this Domain poses are way different from the Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame, but we're winning this &mdash; that I'm sure of.
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' After all, no matter what we face, "no one fights alone." That'll never change!
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Pre-departure rituals are important! Put your hand on mine, and say it with me: "Fight, fight, fight! Victory's in sight!"
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' I just can't stop reading... So many different travelogs and chronicles of adventures, and they're all...so... fascinating!
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Some of the stuff in here is so blatantly over the top that even I can't help but wonder if it's made up...
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' That settles it! As soon as I get the chance, I'll go see for myself! "Seeing is believing"! Right?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Rest well now, start well later, am I right? In my experience, a good night's sleep does way more for recovery than the finest meal...
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' I've weighed up the surrounding area, our timing, and everyone's condition. My conclusion? It's time for a nap and some snacks.
:{{A|vo mualani saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' That's my suggestion as a guide from the "People of the Springs" &mdash; for your consideration.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Nahida==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I'm really curious to know what's at the end of this maze, too.
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' And yes, I know that as we go further in, we're bound to meet tougher and tougher monsters, and maybe even suffer some setbacks along the way.
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' But after the winds and rain have passed, the saplings in the forest grow a little bigger and a little stronger. We'll only get to see the blue sky above the treetops if we keep pressing on, right?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Children have all sorts of wonderful dreams, with more colors than even the feathers of the Dusk Bird.
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' But once they grow up, their once-vibrant dreams slowly begin to fade.
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Luckily, we can use the written word to make a record of our dreams before they disappear. Maybe, when it comes down to it, that's what fairytales are.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I don't much like spending time in places where there's nothing to do. It's like looking at a blank page in a book.
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' But since you're here, maybe we can liven things up a little to make this time more meaningful.
:{{A|vo nahida saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Like... Ooh, we could share some stories with each other before we set off again.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Navia==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo navia saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Navia:''' We'll have to break out the big guns if we wanna show those domain-dwellers who's boss.
:{{A|vo navia saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Navia:''' ...Heh, that didn't sound so different from something I might say in a Spina meeting.
:{{A|vo navia saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Navia:''' I guess it's the same job, at the end of the day: Getting thugs and bullies to eat some humble pie. It's the only way they'll ever learn some manners.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo navia saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Navia:''' I'm assuming that the books here aren't for lending out...?
:{{A|vo navia saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Navia:''' In that case, I guess I'll have to read as much as I can while I'm here and take detailed notes on the best stories. I'm sure the children of Poisson would love to hear them.
:{{A|vo navia saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Navia:''' Also... I noticed that some of the "fairy tales" here really aren't suitable for children at all... Makes me curious what sort of quirky person could've written them, haha.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo navia saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Navia:''' Since we're having a break, how about we enjoy some sweet treats?
:{{A|vo navia saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Navia:''' If you want my recommendation, I'd say lemon cheesecake is the perfect choice for this occasion! Unlike Macarons, it has a tartness to it as well as the sweetness, which excites the tastebuds and keeps you awake and alert.
:{{A|vo navia saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Navia:''' That way, we won't fall asleep reading!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Neuvillette==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' This is not the first battle, nor will it be the last... The battle must go on until the moment you have reached your goal.
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' This is a test of endurance, a quality I find most admirable in those who possess it.
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' Hmm? Working a job requires endurance too? Hmm... Yes, quite true, quite true...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' I find this place very relaxing. I suppose it all comes down to the atmosphere here.
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' It is quiet, but not desolate. And I must say, the interior is most suitably furnished.
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' I would go so far as to say that the owner has superb taste.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' Ah, a lounge. Very good. I approve.
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' You think it's too quiet here? I find it quite to my satisfaction. It is an ideal place to rest and enjoy a little leisure time.
:{{A|vo neuvillette saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Neuvillette:''' My only quibble is the sheer volume of books here... One can only imagine how long it would take to read them all.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Nilou==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' In a funny way, what you're doing here in this domain reminds me of my dance practice at the Grand Bazaar.
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Maybe you dance with danger, and I dance for artistic reasons... But we both share the same desire to perform our best.
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Of course, this is your show. So in here... you lead, and I'll follow.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Ahh, warm lighting, fun stories to read... It's perfect. Oh, not that there's anything wrong with the House of Daena, of course.
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' It's just that... The books there are pretty tough-going, and I tend to get so sleepy reading them that no amount of balloons can help me. And then I usually start getting hungry...
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' I think... Maybe the fairytales here are more my kind of thing.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Since we have some rest time, you should make sure to give your body and mind a proper break. Remember the relaxation technique I taught you previously? You know, the one where you blow your sleepiness into a balloon?
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' Huh...? Too much sleepiness for one balloon? Okay fine, you can use mine instead. Come on! Imagine there's a huge balloon in my hands. Take a deep breath, and blow!
:{{A|vo nilou saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Nilou:''' There you go! See, now doesn't that feel better?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Ningguang==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' You have personally invited me to journey with you. What reason would I have to refuse?
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' Still, as we explore this domain further, I do intend to take the opportunity to gather some more intelligence.
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' Knowledge is power. Why gamble with loose change when you could own the bank vaults?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' All the great works of literature, the city streets full of charm and character... Without a strong economic foundation, they're just wishful thinking.
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' Now that I have amassed a great fortune, when I sit down at night and look down over the world below, I wonder what ways I could use my wealth.
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' After accepting your invitation to come here, I now have a new answer: A library for children, free of charge... I think that could be a good choice.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' This is truly a place of endless mystery... We don't even know what jurisdiction it belongs to...
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' If I could collect a soil sample, or make a record of the furnishing style, then take it back and do some investigation... Perhaps I could find some answers.
:{{A|vo ningguang saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Ningguang:''' What am I doing? Why, resting, of course. But also thinking things over. The two are quite compatible.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Noelle==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' Thank you for inviting me to join your domain exploration team, {{Traveler}}.
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' I have to learn to defeat powerful enemies if I want to become a knight.
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' When it's time to go into battle, I will give it everything I have!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' I've finished cleaning the place, and nobody needs my help right now...
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' The dishes are washed, and the coffee and snacks I prepared as a thank-you gift are ready to serve...
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' If it's not too much of an imposition, would you mind giving me some guidance on my sword work, {{Traveler}}?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' The floorboards need sweeping, the rugs need washing, maybe even replacing, and as for all those books on the shelves... Looks like they could do with someone going through and organizing them a little better.
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' You should go rest, leave all that to me!
:{{A|vo noelle saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Noelle:''' Hmm? Pushing myself too hard? No I'm not! This is my way of relaxing.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Ororon==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' This domain is constantly changing, and the danger constantly evolving.. So I have something for you.
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' This is what we call the "three warnings." Be wary of beasts prowling around, scammers looking for their next victim, and strange people who appear out of nowhere.
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' You'd best learn that by heart &mdash; it might come in handy someday.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' The records here are fascinating, like the clouds in the sky that lie beyond reach. They contain so much information.
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' It would take a real genius to turn all of this into a woven scroll.
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Please don't look at me so... expectantly. I... don't think that's something I could manage myself. Sorry about that.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Thanks for bringing me here. It's so peaceful &mdash; the perfect place to meditate.
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Though there's nothing I really need to think about right now... I might end up nodding off.
:{{A|vo olorun saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' But don't worry, I'll just have to think of something worth thinking about instead...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Qiqi==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' The mission is... defeat the monsters inside this domain.
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' Order received. Order noted.
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' ...Oh yeah, one more order: Don't forget about the mission.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' Stories? What are those?
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' Does writing them down mean you won't forget them?
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' Are there any stories about Qiqi?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' Oh... So it's not time for the battle yet?
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' If you aren't busy, let's do some stretches together.
:{{A|vo qiqi saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Qiqi:''' We mustn't forget to stretch, because otherwise... Hmm. I forgot why.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Raiden Shogun==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Ei:''' I know you are a formidable warrior. But we must not underestimate the monsters in this domain. They seem to come in endless waves.
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Nor should you be afraid. I am here to answer your call, and I will stay by your side until every mystery here has been uncovered.
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Ei:''' With this blade, I shall slay any foe that comes our way.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Will you join me in a game of karuta? It is a fine way to spend leisure time. It will help us both relax, while keeping me sharp and focused.
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Ei:''' The only thing is... It is customary for the winner to be awarded with confectionery, but I do not know whether it can be brought in here...
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Ei:''' Hmm, in that case... We can celebrate the victor at the Sacred Sakura some other time. Now, are you ready to be humbled?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Ei:''' It's not often that I have the chance to take a rest before the battle is truly over.
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Ei:''' I keep asking myself, "Can I really afford to take a rest yet?" And if there are still monsters that have not yet been vanquished, the answer is no &mdash; I cannot stop now.
:{{A|vo raidenei saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Ei:''' ...You'd like to join me in a moment of meditation? Oh, alright. Close your eyes. Now, join me in turning your gaze inward, to the deepest part of your being...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Razor==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo razor saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Razor:''' Many enemies ahead, but, do not fear.
:{{A|vo razor saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Razor:''' Razor protect friends.
:{{A|vo razor saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Razor:''' Razor fight with lupical.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo razor saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Razor:''' Teacher... tell me stories from books before.
:{{A|vo razor saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Razor:''' Stories do not have smell.
:{{A|vo razor saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Razor:''' Cannot guess the ending.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo razor saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Razor:''' Run for a long time... Tired.
:{{A|vo razor saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Razor:''' This place, safe. Good spot, to rest.
:{{A|vo razor saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Razor:''' Here, no meat. A pity...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Rosaria==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' You're assembling a team with the goal of defeating all enemies within this domain, right?
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' Sounds like what I do best. Count me in.
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' Shouldn't we get a move on? Don't let it get too late. You know what my thoughts are on overtime.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' If you've got any work planned for this evening, I politely decline.
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' I just finished some extremely grisly work, so I at least need to give myself a little break first.
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' What kind of grisly? I intend to keep that to myself. Nothing to be happy about, that's for sure. The less you know, the better.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' It's a shame that I'm not allowed to drink in this place.
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' But at least I don't have to deal with the sisters from the church fretting over every little thing. So it's got that going for it.
:{{A|vo rosaria saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Rosaria:''' You're not under any time pressure to get things wrapped up here, right? Well, then here's what I suggest: Forget going into battle. Let's take it easy for a bit.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Sangonomiya Kokomi==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' There are so many different kinds of enemies here. We have to think carefully about how to allocate our troops.
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' If you'd like, I can help you analyze the situation, and make some strategic suggestions.
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Or... I could even write a few directives for you. Of course, whether or not they get used... hehe, well, that'll be your decision.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' It's a rare treat for me, being able to read undisturbed in a quiet place like this.
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' On Watatsumi Island, as the Divine Priestess, every action I take is the subject of scrutiny and speculation. I have to show some restraint so that my personal preferences don't unduly influence everyone else.
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' But here, I feel like I can relax a little. Umm... You won't mind if I suddenly laugh out loud while I'm reading, will you?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' I used to use my rest time to review documents, but... that was when we were at war.
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Given that there's no time pressure here, I prefer to take things at a slower pace, and make sure to rest and recover my energy in between battles.
:{{A|vo kokomi saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' After all, exhaustion is one of the deadliest enemies you can encounter on the battlefield.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Sayu==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' The enemies are pretty tough, right? So you'd probably be better off taking some of your stronger friends...
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' Uhh... No, I'm not being lazy, it's just... my ninjutsu isn't really meant for fighting...
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' Lemme sleep a bit more, just until I get a little bit taller, and then I'm sure I can... Zzz...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' So quiet, and cozy... This is a really great place to catch up on sleep.
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' Oh, yeah &mdash; please don't tell Lady Guuji I'm here... If she finds out, I'm toast!
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' If there are no more battles today, can I chill out here a little longer?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' *snore*... *snore*...
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' Hmm...? A mission?
:{{A|vo sayu saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Sayu:''' Gimme ten more minutes, just ten more... Zzz...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Sethos==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' You know how merchants in a hurry sometimes dangle a little food in front of their Sumpter Beast's face, right? To get them to move faster?
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' I think people are the same way. Give them a little hope, and they can achieve a whole lot more. Take their hope away, and they never seem to succeed.
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' So, I'll explore this place with you to the end. Let's never stop hoping for victory.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' Kay, I've brought water and some rations. Later on, we can build a fire and grill some meat.
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' Hmm? You think we should be safe enough here?
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' Haha, well yeah, I know! That's why I figured this would be a great place for a picnic. The battles are important, but we should take some time to relax first.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' We're free agents now, right? Great. Well, I think I'll stick around here for a bit, you wanna join me?
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' Hmm... Actually, this is a pretty nice place. If I brought some of my people here, I'm sure the kids would enjoy playing hide-and-seek.
:{{A|vo sethos saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Sethos:''' ...There must be quite a story behind this place. It's so vast and mysterious.

==Shenhe==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' Exploring domains is an arduous task. There's always something unpleasant waiting for you up ahead &mdash; either monsters and demons, or bandits and thugs.
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' But I am fated to tread a treacherous path. What difference does a few extra battles make?
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' When the battle starts, let me clear a path. That way, at least, I will do some good.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' I have heard that books harbor the author's emotions.
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' If I spend some time reading them, will it help me understand human emotions better?
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' Do you have any recommendations?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' Whenever my mind becomes agitated, Master encourages me to sit, meditate, and let go of all troubling thoughts.
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' If I lose touch with the real me inside, all that's left is the urge to slay, which makes me a risk to everyone around me...
:{{A|vo shenhe saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Shenhe:''' I do not wish to see that happen.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Shikanoin Heizou==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' The way I see it, the use of force to subdue one's foes should always be a last resort.
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' With enough careful planning and preparation, you can set things up so that by the time you have to confront your enemy, they fall to pieces in your hands. Saves a lot of time that way.
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' Unfortunately, the tables are turned on us here. We're the challengers, and the one pulling the strings is hiding out of our reach.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' The books here are really interesting. They're full of twists and turns that all but defy even my intuition.
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' I can't help but think this domain is a detective's mortal foe... Without a crime, there can be no deduction, and even the greatest storms simply rage on unchecked...
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' But then I remember that all this is to help you. And that's what makes this long grind worth it, right?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' My instincts say that this is a safe spot. Not the slightest whiff of lies or conspiracies.
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' Although to be honest, I wouldn't be averse to a little more atmosphere here &mdash; lightning flashing outside the windows, or a blizzard howling away... We could turn the lights off and tell some ghost stories.
:{{A|vo heizou saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Shikanoin Heizou:''' Oh well, we don't always get what we want in life. So instead &mdash; pull up a chair, and let's get some rest.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Sigewinne==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Being in this domain is just as exciting as watching a Pankration match... And who's been a brave, heroic champion? Mmhmm! That's right, you have!
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Anyway, do you mind if I come with you next time?
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Not that I doubt your fighting ability, of course. It's just... It's so much more dangerous in there than I ever imagined.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' I just read this line in a children's book: "Friendship takes sacrifice. Only through sacrifice can friendships be made."
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' I agree. And the same principle applies in other areas of life, too.
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' It definitely applies to healthcare. If you wanna get healthy, there are things that you just have to sacrifice.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' There doesn't appear to be a dedicated infirmary here... Well, you'll just have to rest here. Now, just relax...
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' No serious wounds... Wonderful, you've been taking excellent care of yourself. Keep up the good work!
:{{A|vo sigewinne saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Since you're all clear, all you need to do is replenish your energy levels. I brought some nutritious shakes &mdash; here, take one.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Sucrose==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' What exactly lies in the deepest part of this domain? I actually have quite a few theories already...
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' But given all the monsters we keep finding, it looks like we have a tough road ahead before we can confirm the facts.
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' Still, it'll all be worth it as long as we find the answer in the end. At least... that's what I think.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' I once read a story about a wonderful paradise. Later on in life, it was also books that got me interested in studying alchemy.
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' It's funny, but even now, that storybook about paradise and my alchemy textbooks are right next to each other on the bookshelf next to my bed...
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' One day, I hope to break down the barriers between those books by using bio-alchemy to create that paradise for real.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' I wonder whether this potion I made has any potential combat applications...
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' Oh! Don't worry, I understand that this isn't an appropriate location to conduct those kinds of experiments... It's too risky, and might do more harm than good if something went wrong.
:{{A|vo sucrose saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Sucrose:''' It's just... hard to switch off and rest when all these hypotheses are swirling around in my brain... *sigh*
{{Dialogue End}}

==Tartaglia==
After completing [[Chapter IV]] of the [[Archon Quest]]s, [[Tartaglia]] will no longer appear in the Theater Lobby.

===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' If you wanna become a true warrior, the strongest enemies are the ones you should be most excited about.
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' After all, a gruesome, grisly fight to the death is one of the best ways to hone your skills.
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' I honestly can't even get in the mood unless there's a bit of a challenge involved.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' Aside from all the children's books, I quite like some of the furnishings here. Like that Star Lamp, for example. I'm sure Tonia, Anthon, and Teucer would love it.
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' Okay, there's my intro: "My dear sister, I am writing to you from a rest stop in an ancient castle filled with star lamps"...
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' Hmm... Maybe that'll get them a little too intrigued? If they end up wanting to follow me here after reading this letter, then we'll be in trouble.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' Well, {{Traveler}}, you invited me to meet you here, so I'm guessing that means you're ready for a rematch?
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' Haha, I'm just kidding, of course. This place is for resting, I wouldn't start a fight here &mdash; I do have some manners.
:{{A|vo tartaglia saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Tartaglia:''' I am getting a little restless here, though. Hope the next battle's a big one, I need a good workout.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Thoma==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' How're you feeling? Try not to worry too much about the next fight!
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' I've heard people say that having a good attitude actually benefits your health.
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' Even if spearmanship isn't my strong suit, I'll do my best to protect you in this battle!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' When I was little, my mother often read me bedtime stories. Back then, I thought the world was just like in those stories, and everyone led peaceful, happy lives.
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' It was only later that I realized the difficulties and struggles many people face in society. All I can do is try my best, and stay loyal to the people I care about.
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' Now that I think about it, even though the stories are fictional, they can still help children get a good night's sleep. To me, that's enough.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' Thanks for inviting me here, {{Traveler}}!
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' If there's nothing too urgent that needs your attention, why not take a seat and relax for a bit? I'll make you some tea.
:{{A|vo thoma saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Thoma:''' Oh, don't mention it, it's nothing, really! I'd hate to see anyone who needs my care tiring themselves out too much.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Tighnari==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Just as knowledge is often acquired only through hands-on learning, victory is usually secured by overcoming a challenge.
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' In that sense, domain explorers are knowledge seekers too, just with a different methodology.
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Of course, it's not suited to everyone. I'd encourage people to stick to their own areas of expertise.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' I imagine most people think of academia as so strict and rigorous that they think scholars are uninterested in works of fiction.
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' But in reality, if your thinking is too rigid, you're likely to get stuck in your research.
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Yes, stories might be pure fabrications, but sometimes they can give us just the inspiration we need to move our research forward.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Hmm... Multiple scents, all mingled together... Looks like many people have used this place as a rest stop.
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Hmm? ...There's a floral scent, you say?
:{{A|vo tighnari saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Tighnari:''' Ah yes, that would be the plant-based essential oil I just applied. What do you think? Wanna check out my freshly groomed tail?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Varesa==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' Back home, whenever I fight, it's to protect the people of the tribe. But here, it's more like... never-ending wrestling training.
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' It means I can go all out without worrying about hurting anyone, and I don't get so angry about the injustice of it all. It's so... liberating!
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' I'm sure that the more I challenge myself here, the stronger I'll become, and the closer I'll get to being like all the fearless heroes I look up to... Definitely gonna come here more often!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' Don't forget to stretch your muscles and relax in between battles. Otherwise, the fatigue will only build up over time, until your limbs are all sore and stiff.
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' I know some really good assisted stretches, but I've only done them with Coach Iansan before. She's the only one who can handle my strength...
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' ...But I'm sure you can handle it too! How about I help you relax first, and then you help me with my stretching after?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' I love this place! It feels like we've just walked straight into a fairytale, where we're both dazzling warriors!
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' But that seems to be as far as the magic goes... No invincibility or anything. It still hurts when I get hit, and I still get tired after fighting for too long.
:{{A|vo varesa saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Varesa:''' That means we can't just defeat all the enemies in one fell swoop. We'll have to pace ourselves and keep replenishing our energy. I brought plenty of Blazed Meat Stew &mdash; you want some?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Venti==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo venti saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Venti:''' "When danger rose they overcame their foes, onward forging to the journey's end"...
:{{A|vo venti saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Venti:''' My dear, courageous {{Traveler}}, if you will allow this humble bard to join you on your journey, it would be my honor to compose an epic poem to remember your deeds.
:{{A|vo venti saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Venti:''' I'm willing to bet a whole glass of Apple Cider that your story will be one for the ages!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo venti saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Venti:''' There's a lot of fascinating stories in these books.
:{{A|vo venti saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Don't be put off by the dusty old pages. Give them a chance, and in the blink of an eye, these tales will waft into the air to the sound of the lyre, and blend into the sweetness of the breeze.
:{{A|vo venti saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Pick a story you like! Let's try it out!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo venti saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Venti:''' So, a short rest before the big battle, huh? In that case, I think some light-hearted music is in order.
:{{A|vo venti saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Something easygoing enough to help everyone relax, but not to the point where it becomes too snoozeworthy.
:{{A|vo venti saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Take a seat wherever you like! Once you're comfortable, Der Frühling and I shall begin our serenade.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Wanderer==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' You call crushing ants a "challenge"?
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' The novelty of these little scuffles quickly wore off for me &mdash; now it's just tedious. It amazes me that some people enjoy it so much.
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' Keep up if you want my help. I don't want to be stuck here all day.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' No, I don't want to "chat."
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' What are you making that face for? I thought you knew my deal by now.
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' ...*sigh*. Fine. You can talk, and I'll sit over there and listen. Happy now?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' You need a break already? Your travels sure have made you soft.
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' Can't we just go and get this over with? We're not fighting a trained army here. We'll run circles around those morons.
:{{A|vo wanderer saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''{{Wanderer}}:''' ...Alright, suit yourself. Just don't keep me waiting too long.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Wriothesley==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' If experience is anything to go by, the further in we go, the tougher our enemies will get.
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' But even if they don't, getting all the way end isn't exactly gonna be a walk in the park.
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' Whichever way you cut it, we have to make sure we're fully prepared.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' There are worse ways to kill time than fairytales.
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' The simple wording, the childlike wonder, the romanticism &mdash; it all makes for some nice easy reading that doesn't require any brainpower.
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' Well, until you start noticing some of the more uncomfortable parallels between fantasy and reality.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' After taking a look around here, I'm wondering whether to expand our library at the Fortress of Meropide.
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' Hmm, then again, most of our collection consists of legal advice pamphlets and mechanics textbooks, which no one reads... So, maybe not.
:{{A|vo wriothesley saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Wriothesley:''' ...Novels? You're right, those would be more popular &mdash; that's also why you can never find them in the library. They disappear from the shelves instantly, never to be seen again...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Xiangling==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' Are you tired? I know a trick that works great &mdash; imagine all the enemies you're facing as delicious ingredients!
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' With all that tender, delicious-smelling food nearby... Doesn't it just give you a big burst of energy?
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' Huh? Hard to imagine? Hmm, maybe it's just me, then...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' Only a handful of my more experimental dishes have made it onto the Wanmin Restaurant menu.
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' In most cases, it's because I think the texture isn't quite right, or the flavor needs a lot more work... But that doesn't mean I'm about to give up.
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' I know there are tasty dishes out there waiting to be discovered, and I'll find them sooner or later!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' I imagine you'll wanna keep fighting soon &mdash; do you want a bite to eat first? You know you love my cooking!
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' You should never work on an empty stomach! More importantly, a proper meal will put you in a good mood, and you'll handle yourself better in a crisis.
:{{A|vo xiangling saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Xiangling:''' Here, some chopsticks for ya. Don't be shy now, dig in!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Xianyun==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' The scoundrels who slink around in here are fools, all of them. To posture menacingly before mortals is one thing...
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' But to persist even after witnessing one's adeptus arts... It is sheer illiteracy in the face of manifestly legible writing on the wall.
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' Hmph! These dullards would be no match even for one's two disciples, let alone oneself.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' When storytellers tell tales pertaining to oneself, they often resort to slapdash stitchwork derived from decrepit documents, garnished with a glut of aggrandizement.
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' Entertaining, to be sure. But do not believe everything you hear. Of course, if you wish to hear the truth, you need only ask me.
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' ...In fact, one is suddenly reminded of an old tale. It begins with a gathering of the adepti at Jueyun Karst...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' This domain is filled with mystery, but one fears that we shall miss much if we are too hasty to proceed. Perhaps we could pause for a moment...
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' Hmm... There is little of interest in this area, and if we were to while away the time through conversation... Our throats would surely grow parched...
:{{A|vo xianyun saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Xianyun:''' Shall one fashion a Supreme Tea-Brewing Machine one of these days? That way, the fragrance of tea shall be ours to enjoy wherever we please... Yes, a capital idea indeed...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Xiao==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' The air grows thick with the stench of evil...
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' I could handle the upcoming battles on my own, but I know you wouldn't agree to it.
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' So promise me at least that you will not let your guard down.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' The legacy of the yakshas lives on in the historical records that tell our tales... Still, that brings no solace to me or my late comrades.
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' ...
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' But watching the Xiao Lanterns rise into the sky during the Lantern Rite... that is what brings me peace.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' Fighting monsters is nothing new to me.
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' If anything... It is these brief periods of leisure between battles that I'm not accustomed to.
:{{A|vo xiao saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Xiao:''' No matter. If you need to rest, I will stay here with you until you are ready.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Xilonen==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' I can go scout ahead if you want.
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' You've seen me at full speed. When I go all out, no monster can catch me.
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Hmm, maybe we should go together just to be safe. Alright &mdash; lead the way.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' I don't see anything like the woven scrolls we have in Natlan around here. The books on the shelves are all fairy tales.
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' I don't think I can learn anything useful from this material...
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Hmm... Guess I'll just take a rock sample and analyze it back home.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Finally, a chance for a break. Let's find a place to sit down.
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Don't get too tense. There's no point stressing about things that haven't happened yet. Just focus on the here and now.
:{{A|vo xilonen saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Here, have a drink. Want some chocolate? Or milk candy, maybe?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Xingqiu==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' I have crossed paths with many a wicked foe in my time. When they come for you with knives in their hands and malice in their hearts, you cannot cower in fear, for this only emboldens them further.
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' It is a hero's duty to seize victory with their sword, even in the most perilous of battles.
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' Although, things are different this time, because I'm not fighting alone... So let's watch each other's backs?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' This little book is truly exceptional. The gripping plot is one thing, but the characters, wow... they're so well rounded. They really break the mold.
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' I can't thank you enough for inviting me to this incredible place, {{Traveler}}.
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' The next time I find a good novel, I'll make sure to get a copy for you.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' There is a vast collection of books here. I took a moment to browse through earlier, and found a good number worth reading.
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' If you're not presently occupied, why not take a seat? I'll fetch a few good books and you can see if there are any you like.
:{{A|vo xingqiu saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Xingqiu:''' A fine book on a busy day can provide a much-needed escape, even if just for a moment.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Xinyan==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' Whenever I'm on stage, I always wanna push my music a little bit further, and make that one guitar riff even gnarlier!
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' A live gig is a different kind of beast than the ones we're facing here, that's for sure... But I ain't one to back down from a challenge.
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' When the crowd's waitin', you gotta get out there and face the music. Same applies here. So come on &mdash; time to do some shredding!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' If someone wrote me into a story, I don't think I'd be the little kiddos' favorite character.
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' People tend to judge others based on first impressions. And kids are too young to know any different, they just say whatever they're thinking... I'm well aware of that.
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' But that doesn't matter! Just you wait and see, I'll win 'em over with my music sooner or later!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' You sure don't look like you're rarin' to go anywhere. Wanna listen to my new song?
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' Hmm... Although, this doesn't really seem like the right place for a rock 'n' roll concert...
:{{A|vo xinyan saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Xinyan:''' Let's talk about some of your adventuring highlights instead! They're pretty rock 'n' roll too!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Yae Miko==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Dear me, is it time to go off and fight again already? All this running around is getting quite exasperating...
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' I have half a mind to transform into a kitsune and hitch a ride on your shoulder... Hehehe, you'd like that, wouldn't you?
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' In your dreams. Oh, little one... you've still got a long way to go before Yae Miko, the wise and beautiful, permits you to see her true form.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Do you think we'd ever see Ei in the outside world again if there were this many stories to read in her Plane of Euthymia? ...I, for one, rather doubt it.
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Hmm, I have an idea. Let's tell her that we know a wonderful little domain full of light novels and Tricolor Dango. It's high time she got out of Tenshukaku for a bit.
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Ah yes, and Dango Milk too. ...Hmm? They don't have it here? Well, don't look at me, little one, that's your job. Sort it out. Where there's a will, there's a way.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' The novels here actually aren't all that bad. But a little fried tofu and a few drinks would make things better still...
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' So, little one, do you think you could pull a few strings and get your hands on some for me? Without them... I don't think I'll be able to muster the energy to help you explore this domain...
:{{A|vo yaemiko saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Yae Miko:''' Hahaha, oh, the look on your face, so dumbfounded... I'm joking, can't you tell? Do you really believe the great Lady Guuji herself would be so fickle?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Yanfei==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' If you think about it, you could define a "challenge" as a process that's difficult to get control over due to a lack of key information. Right?
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' Example: What foes are we likely to encounter when exploring this domain? How many hostile encounters are likely to occur? And what available countermeasures can we use?
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' Take the time to thoroughly consider all these questions. Then you'll find that reaching your goal is no longer a "challenge" at all.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' Do you think that the way fairytales end is just whimsical? Or do you think the writers put a lot of thought into it?
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' Because if you read them from the point of view of trying to identify what each character symbolically represents, you find a lot of very deep metaphors.
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' Still, in order to verify my hypothesis and see if it stands up to scrutiny, I need to do some historical and cultural research... Maybe I could borrow some of these materials here so I can do a deep-dive later.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' This place is so quiet! It's a perfect place to brush up on my legal research and organize my notes.
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' Hey, {{Traveler}}, do you still remember those clauses I discussed with you once before?
:{{A|vo yanfei saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Yanfei:''' You've already forgotten? Well, you'll just have to recite them over and over until you know them by heart.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Yaoyao==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' I sometimes have to face dangerous enemies when I'm out in the mountains gathering herbs. Like those greedy-gut Treasure Hoarders, or a boar in a bad mood.
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' I know that not everywhere is gonna be as peaceful as the place where I grew up with my mom and dad. And Master won't always there to protect me.
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' That's why I practice the spear, even though I don't really like it. It's so I can drive those pesky varmints off all by myself!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' The kinds of books that adults read have so many complicated ideas in them. I can't wrap my head around them no matter how hard I try.
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' Master says that there are many things I'll understand once I'm older.
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' So does that mean that when you grow up, you understand the same things in a different way?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' You look tired, do you need to take a rest?
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' If you're feeling peckish, I've brought some Fried Radish Balls. I made them before we came here.
:{{A|vo yaoyao saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Yaoyao:''' Try to take life at a slower pace &mdash; it's good for your health!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Yelan==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' We've still got quite a few punishing battles ahead of us, don't we? You ready?
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' If life gets too dull for too long, I start to feel numb inside. I need some excitement to make me feel alive.
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' Why don't I roll the dice? If I like the numbers I roll, we'll keep going... Could be a fun way to liven things up around here.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' There are real people and real events out there that are more incredible than anything you'll find in fiction. Shame no one'll ever be allowed to write a book about it.
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' Curious? What if I told you that the things I'm referring to... no one'll ever be allowed to talk about, either?
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' Hehe... Okay, we can chat about something that isn't top-secret information if you want... But we'll still have to go somewhere a little more private.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' A safe house, huh... I'm not a fan of using safe houses that I haven't personally vetted and kitted out. But this is better than nothing.
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' Exploring this domain is one heck of a big job. Even if I wanted to get it over and done with in one go... Looks like neither the rules of this place nor my stamina would allow it.
:{{A|vo yelan saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Yelan:''' You should conserve your energy too. Don't run yourself ragged, it's not worth it.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Yoimiya==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' There are so many enemies here! If all of them were written into a youkai story, it'd be dark long before you finished just reading the names out!
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' But fear not! The Invincible Yoimiya is here to save you from the clutches of the evil youkai!
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' ...Haha, okay, that was a little embarrassing... But I sounded pretty cool, right?
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' You sure don't need to worry about me getting bored here. I'm spoiled for choice with all these books! I hardly know where to start!
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' I want to memorize all the interesting parts, so I can go back and tell them to my friends!
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' Oh, right, that's another thing I meant to ask! Which of these books do you recommend? I want to know what kind of stories you're into!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' Want to get some shut-eye and rest for a bit? I'll keep you company!
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' Or... If you're not sleepy, how about we chat for a bit? Maybe I could tell you a story!
:{{A|vo yoimiya saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Yoimiya:''' Oh, sorry! Am I talking too much? Hehe, I just get so excited when I'm in a new place &mdash; I wanna see everything there is to see. I've always got the energy to explore!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Yumemizuki Mizuki==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' It's a completely different feeling... fighting here.
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' It's so different from dealing with nightmares. It almost feels like... dancing in a dream or enjoying some kind of impromptu performance.
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' I suppose this is as good a place as any to get some combat experience. Once we're done here, we should go for a soak in the hot springs.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' If you think about it... Could this play be a part of a dream?
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' Fascinating... Dreams tend to exist on a binary &mdash; either dark or light, with notes of bitterness or joy... Yet, this dream defies my attempts to understand it.
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' With you to guide me, I'm eager to venture further into this place and discover the colors at the heart of this dream.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' Remember, there's no need to rush. Push yourself too hard, and all that stress will give you nightmares.
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' And nightmares will absolutely sap your energy!
:{{A|vo mizuki saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Yumemizuki Mizuki:''' So, take it easy. If your body's telling you to rest, you need to listen. You can take a nap right here next to me, how about that?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Yun Jin==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' Take any character penned by any playwright from any point in history, and you'll find that not a single one of them fulfilled their destiny without first enduring many trials and tribulations.
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' Though the road ahead is treacherous, fear not.
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' With the aid of our companions, and our wills united as one, we can surely overcome any obstacle.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' Novels do have their poignant moments, but if I only read the text on the page, I can't help but feel like something is missing.
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' It's only when I've brought a character to the stage that I'm truly able to feel all the emotions their story is meant to convey.
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' There's truth to the saying that you can't see the mountain for what it really is when you're standing at the peak. But there are also breathtaking views that can only be beheld if you scale the summit.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' In my eyes, battle is not unlike a performance: You must remain absolutely focused to avoid any errors. But all the enjoyment of performing isn't present in battle, so it inevitably gets tiring after a while.
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' Take a moment and allow yourself to rest. We can have a nice chat over some refreshments and tea.
:{{A|vo yunjin saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Yun Jin:''' Once we've replenished our strength, we will begin our next act, and teach those villains a lesson they won't ever forget.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Zhongli==
===Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom challenge 01.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' I suspect battle is not the ultimate objective, but merely part of a process by which to advance towards a greater goal. Perhaps this place contains something you desire.
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom challenge 02.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' Let us proceed together, then. Whatever trial awaits us, we shall face it as one.
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom challenge 03.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' Should you find yourself gripped by fear or panic, simply retreat behind me and follow my lead.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Small-Talk===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom others 01.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' This place appears to be well-furnished. A long table, appropriate equipment for preparing tea... With enough people, a gathering could certainly be organized here.
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom others 02.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' What say you to such a gathering?
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom others 03.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' It has been quite some time since we last spoke over tea. I believe a thorough retelling of your latest exploits is long overdue.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Resting===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom rest 01.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' This domain affords the opportunity for endless challenges while also providing an ample place to rest. Most fascinating indeed.
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom rest 02.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' It stands to reason that the creator of this realm holds lofty expectations for those who enter.
:{{A|vo zhongli saferoom rest 03.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' Even the lengthiest of battles have their end. As for how long this one shall last, I suppose that remains to be discovered...
{{Dialogue End}}
